    Researcher & Tech Artist

    PostDoc Researcher at Unipd. Learning to be a Technical Artist. Creative and passionate about blending art and technology.

    • Padova, Italy
    • University of Padova

    Publications

    For the full list of my publications please refer to my Google Scholar profile .

    Conference Papers

    SAGE: Semantic-Driven Adaptive Gaussian Splatting in Extended Reality Marco Maida, Alberto Crescini, Marco Perronet, Elena Camuffo EUSIPCO, 2025 PDF
    Age of Information for Quantum Communication Channels with Monogamy of Entanglement Aygun Jabrayilova, Elena Camuffo, Laura Crosara, Leonardo Badia MeditCOM, 2025
    Enhanced Model Robustness to Input Corruptions by Per-corruption Adaptation of Normalization Statistics Elena Camuffo, Umberto Michieli, Simone Milani, Jijoong Moon, Mete Ozay International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS), 2024 PDF
    Continual Road-Scene Semantic Segmentation via Feature-Aligned Symmetric Multi-Modal Network Francesco Barbato, Elena Camuffo, Simone Milani, Pietro Zanuttigh International Conference on Image Processing (ICIP), 2024 PDF
    Fully Automated Scan-to-BIM via Point Cloud Instance Segmentation Devid Campagnolo, Elena Camuffo, Umberto Michieli, Paolo Borin, Simone Milani, Andrea Giordano International Conference on Image Processing (ICIP), 2023 PDF Slides Code Dataset
    FFT-based Selection and Optimization of Statistics for Robust Recognition of Severely Corrupted Images Elena Camuffo, Umberto Michieli, Jijoong Moon, Daheyun Kim, Mete Ozay International Conference on Acoustics, Speech, and Signal Processing (ICASSP), 2023 PDF Blog
    Continual Learning for LiDAR Semantic Segmentation: Class-Incremental and Coarse-to-Fine Strategies on Sparse Data Elena Camuffo, Simone Milani Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition Workshops (CVPRW), 2023 PDF Code
    3D Model Optimization for Immersive and Interactive Applications Elena Camuffo, Francesco Battisti, Francesco Pham, Simone Milani European Workshop on Visual Information Processing (EUVIP), 2022 PDF Slides Code
    Moving Drones for Wireless Coverage in a Three-Dimensional Grid Analyzed via Game Theory Elena Camuffo, Leonardo Gorghetto, Leonardo Badia 2021 IEEE Asia Pacific Conference on on Circuits and Systems (APCCAS), 2021 PDF Slides
